page.title: 10Children's Games 1
page.content: {Duck and Goose. You need about 10 to 20 people to play this game.All the players sit in a circle.One player is picked to be "It"."It" skips round the circle and "tigs" or pats people on the head and says "Duck". If "It" says "Goose" the "Goose" has to chase "It" in and out of the circle.You can change the rules. {War. You need about four or more. You need a toy gun or a stick. The game begins when you make a barricade and hide behind it. Then we all pretend to shoot each other.If you are shot you are not allowed to keep running. You have to count to fifty before you are allowed to join in again.
